attributes.action: Impliment The Scottish FREE OAP Care System
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We already pay for FREE HealthCare for all. It is paid for under the guise of National Insurance Contributions! which are increased on a regular basis.!!
The government has already stated that the elderly should not pay for their care, so why are they forced to sell their houses?
IF SCOTLAND CAN IMPLEMENT AND FUND FREE HEALTH CARE THEN SO SHOULD ENGLAND. WE SHOULD RETURN TOO THE ORIGINAL CONCEPT OF THE NHS SETUP IN THE 1940's. FREE FOR ALL!!
